short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generate a fake 44 character dynamic password straight to your clipboard.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: CCCC generator is a simple one-click too that generates a fake 44 character OTP (one time password) and copies it to your clipboard. This provides a helpful utility when needing to quickly generate test data.
